body.name: SnugPad -Upgraded Memory Foam Seat Cushion, for Sciatica, Back, Hip, and Tailbone Pain Relief, Firm Comfortable, Support for Office Chair, Wheelchair,Car. Nonslip Orthopedic Memory Foam Coccyx Cushion

features: Made in the USA or Imported

1.DESIGNED FOR BACK PAIN & SCIATICA RELIEF: The U-shaped Ergonomically design, provides support and comfort while reducing pressure on the tailbone ,and cut out and promotes healthy posture. Supports recovery from lower back problems, helps with most sitting pain due to sciatica, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, pregnancy, hip pain and hemorrhoids. Our seat cushion is designed to help relieve pain while sitting however it may not work for all conditions or completely eliminate all pain symptoms

2.100% PREMIUM HIGH-DENSITY MEMORY FOAM CUSHION: SnugPad memory foam is 100% pure with no additives and can be used to improve bad posture and relieve leg pain while driving or sitting for long periods, enhancing your comfort while retaining its density. NON-SLIP rubber bottom, Handle desigh for easy transport and machine, washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning.

3.PERFECT FIT FOR OFFICE CHAIR, DRIVING AND TRAVELING: Provides comfort on most hard surfaces; office chair, desk chair, kitchen, car seat, airplane, rocking chairs and wheelchairs. Great for office use, truck drivers, frequent travelers, sporting events and pregnancy. As a very practical gift for your wife, parents, grandparents, friends and family, bring health to him/her !

4.ORTHOPEDIC DOCTOR RECOMMENDED - We use a U shaped ergonomic design recommended by orthopedic surgeons and medical doctors across the globe for treatment of chronic or acute pain by alleviating pressure in strategic areas. Helps to relieve symptoms of: Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores. Can also be used in place of donut pillows.

5.WE PROMISE 100% SATISFACTION : We promise 100% satisfactory after-sales service,45 days unconditional refund,Up to 12 months product quality warranty (Free replacement),so that your purchase has no worries !

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfort and Pressure Relief Instant Relief Helpful for: Coccyx/Tailbone Sciatica and Back Pain Long Hours of Sitting Pregnancy Herniated Discs Spinal Alignment Piriformis Syndrome Product Dimensions: 17.7 (W) x 14(L) x 2.8(H) inches. SnugPad Coccyx Seat Cushion's innovative U-cut design will relieve pressure on your coccyx, helping back pain. Our ergonomic design will bring comfort to you in any situation, whether you're traveling or working. If you have back pain, seek comfort in our SnugPad Coccyx Seat Cushion Important Information: Memory Foam is Heat & Weight Responsive: Your cushion's firmness may change according to the temperature of its surroundings. Warmer surroundings will result in it being softer and colder temperatures will harden it. Room temperature is ideal for optimal performance. SnugPad Coccyx Cushion will also provide less support with increasing weight.

Perfect for any situation Better comfort when traveling Take your SnugPad with you wherever you go. Those long traffic jams, cramped flights, and family trips just got a lot more comfortable and bearable. Why put yourself through that pain? Get some SnugPad support for your back. Reduce your back pain Working long hours frequently can have adverse effects on your back and spine. Without proper support, you could have debilitating issues in the future. SnugPad Coccyx Seat Cushion will help alleviate that pain. Easy to carry on the go Our SnugPad Coccyx Seat Cushion has an attached velour handle, so you can comfortably take it with you to work, home, or long trips. Never be without support.

Highest Quality Production and Materials Perfect Size Seat Cushion Our cushion won't flatten like other similar cushions. It is carefully crafted to ensure that it retains its shape to provide one of the best, long-lasting support. Removable Velour Cover Our sleek, black cover is removable and machine washable. Remove the zippered cover for easy cleaning when needed. Anti-Slip Rubber Bottom The underside of the cushion has a non-slip rubber grip, so your SnugPad Coccyx Cushion can stay attached to any surface. Ergonomic Shape & Design Our cushion will hug your rear as you sit, eliminating point pressure and distributing support evenly so you can sit for longer without discomfort, improving posture and providing superior comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: An excellent to sit especially for long trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pair of these for my husband and I. We use them when we drive long distances. They really do make a difference. My sciatica and my shoulder pain are greatly reduced. I was pleasantly surprised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I've had Siatica problems lately. A friend mentioned this cushion and for the price I'd try anything. I could not drive more than 45 minutes before the pain made me ask my wife to continue. Now with the cushion I can do much better. We drove about 275 miles last weekend with only one stop for lunch and during the trip I had NO problems with pain. It takes a little getting used do as the pillow or cushion makes you sit a little higher than normal and is a bit strange feeling at first but after about 15 minutes you'll get used to it. I rated it a 3 for pain relief because I still haven't tried it on a really long trip but for my most recent one it worked fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend, it has been such relief
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has saved me-It is excellent. I have had relief from the first day I have cancer in my lumbar spine L2 & L5- and a hefty compression fracture on L5. Ive just had it for four days and my pain has been cut by half- 7-8 level pain to a 3-4 on the usual scale zero to 10. Oncologist says it’s the impingement from the compression fracture. The pain starts at the lumbar sacral juncture & radiates thru hips into both quads. I reckon it must be like severe sciatica with lower back involved 3 fold. My feet & toes also affected- it was brutal. but improved since the cushion. I sleep in a recliner - which was my only relief- but with this cushion - I can sleep and the agony has stepped down to moderate aching pain that is tolerable. I have been able to reduce the pain meds by one dose at least in a 24 hour period. Everyone is different, but it sure helps me!Thank you for providing this. Thank you so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to hopefully help my butt not be so sore when i am working at my desk. I bought this pair so i could give one to my boyfriend as well. He didnt like it so I keep one on my computer chair and one in my car. The one at my computer chair I feel has gone pretty flat by now. It doesnt feel as firm or like it is doing much other than being slightly softer than what it would feel like without it on my chair. If i were to throw a plain pillow under my butt it would probably feel about the same. Just slight cushionThe one in my car though, is still super firm. The only reason for that is I rarely leave or drive my car. Maybe once or twice a month. I work from home mainly so it still has its thick firm form to it, even when it gets scorching hot in the car. I am tempted to switch them but i enjoy having what feels like a bit of a booster seat in my car because im a bit short.I would probably not buy another intentionally. If there was a day i needed one do to surgery with short recovery then maybe yeah but for long use, no. I felt it was worth buying and using for the time it lasted for the price. I doubt there are any of these made that would hold firm for a lifetime. For the time it lasted it did feel as if it helped. Best of luck to and hope this review helped others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2018
reviews.reviewText: My truck seat sits low so my knees are above my waist while I drive and I kept experiencing back pain while driving an hour or more. I felt that if I could get up higher it would be alieviated. I tried a regular foam pillow for a bed. It just squished down over time and only delayed the pain rather than fixing it. I tried another seat cusion for vehicles that was gel and although it was very comfortable and squishy on the cheeks it had the same issue as the foam pillow. I purchased this cushion several months back and had been ecstatic. PROBLEM SOLVED! Made a four hour drive shortly after my purchase and prepared for the worst... stepped out of the truck and my back felt no worse than it did when I first got onto the road. If you’re worried because you’ve read that it is kind of stiff and doesn’t allow you to sink into it... that’s the point! It is helping with your posture. Also if it were any thinner than it is when gives that little bit of squish it would be a pancake... again defeating the purpose like the others that I have tried. Thank you for a great product! You have helped to bring back my pleasure in road trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the support that these two give me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just some extra cushion for the tush.
reviews.reviewText: If you truly have medical needs by which you could benefit from some relief in the sacral area while sitting, this won’t be supportive enough. I suffer from sciatica caused by disc herniations and the instant I sat on the cushion I could feel where the cut out is and it felt pretty good, but in a matter of seconds the whole thing was flattened and compressed, bringing my tail bone down again by the weight of my body, and pressure felt evenly dispersed on the seat again, making the cut out useless. The cushion is a few inches thick but the memory foam is not dense enough and flattens down to almost nothing. I feel this would be the case even if I was as light as a feather. But even if your just looking for a seat cushion for mere comfort I would suggest something better.

La verdad es buen producto, es cómodo. Lo uso en el trabajo y desde que lo uso no he tenido problemas con mi cadera y espalda, es más puedo estar sentado mucho tiempo y no siento incomodidad. Lo recomiendo.
Lo que más me ha gustado es que mi coxis ya no sufre.
Firm foam, fit the bottom well.
Buen producto a buen precio, cumple con su función y alivia la espalda del dolor. No le doy 5 estrellas porque apenas tiene 15 días de uso y los elásticos del soporte lumbar se están deteriorando.
